game.name: Stickman Zombie Shooting 3D
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The city has been infected! Shoot and kill the zombie stickmen. Fast-paced arcade gameplay through dozens of bespoke levels. The stickman world needs your help - or at least for you not to die too quickly.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The city has been infected! Shoot and kill the zombie stickmen. Fast-paced arcade gameplay through dozens of bespoke levels. The stickman world needs your help - or at least for you not to die too quickly.
